DOC.brief_summary: Imbio develop Smoking Cessation Report ( Report ) include data analysis CT lung cancer screen exam . This randomize control ( RCT ) trial clinically validate Report 's effectiveness motivating smoker call Quitline .
DOC.brief_title: Personalized Smoking Cessation Tool Based Patient Lung CT Image
DOC.detailed_description: Imbio develop Smoking Cessation Report ( Report ) include data analysis CT lung cancer screen exam . This randomize control ( RCT ) trial clinically validate Report 's impact : ( ) Lung screen participant ' motivation make quit attempt call Quitline , ( b ) effectiveness 45-minute telephone smoke cessation counsel session motivate actual quit attempt abstinence . The RCT enroll approximately 400 randomly select participant lung screen program HealthPartners University Michigan . Participants randomly assign one four condition : 1 ) Usual Care + quitline phone number ( create specifically trial maintain length trial ) ; 2 ) Usual Care + Report ( Report list Quitline number ) 3 ) Usual Care + Counseling , 4 ) Usual Care + Report + Counseling . Follow assessment call conduct participant three week , three month , six month follow mail report .
DOC.criteria: 30pack year smoke history currently smoke OR quit within last 15 year category 1 2 LungRADS scan current use smoking cessation medication scan read category 3 , 4A , 4B 4X LungRADS unstable medical psychiatric condition current alcohol drug use disorder pastmonth suicidal ideation pastyear suicide attempt
